item.title: how to attend Harvard
item.description: going to Harvard at my home I’ve been studying web development since last week.and I had a chance to learn some of basics of computer science. It got me interested and through out the weekend I wanted to study more CS so I look up what the actual computer scrience class teaches. In fact you don’t have to really attend university to see the lectures. Because we are living in
